flawed_nl_solution:
Jan was 2 years older than Cindy who was 5 so 2+5 = <<2+5=9>>9 years old
Marica was twice as old as Jan so 2*9 = <<2*9=18>>18 years old
Greg was 2 years older than Marcia who was 18 so 2+18 = <<2+18=20>>20 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
